mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NANDAL_USER( usercode, id, password, nickname, img, birth, gender, loc, phone, email, usergrade, joindate) VALUES( usercode_num_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{img}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{loc}, #{phone}, #{email}, 1, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NANDAL_USER WHERE id=#{id} and password=#{password}
SELECT count(*) FROM NANDAL_USER WHERE id=#{id} and password=#{password}

and title LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
